name: Google Calendar -- Full Screen Calendar
description:
An update to my previous styles.  This new style incorporates/adjusts-to Google's June/July 2011 Calendar updates.  After applying this style, users will see the Google Search section disappear as well as the left-hand calendar tools.  

Set you Calendar settings to "Comfortable".

***NOTE*** Once this style is applied, you will NOT be able to change the colors of individual calendars, as these options are only accessible via the now-hidden, left-side panel.  Please set up your color schemes before enabling.  To make changes after enabling, please disable Stylish or unload this style.
additional_info:
=== v2.31 === 29 Dec 2014 ===

More cleanup after Google changes.  ***Set Calendar to "Comfortable" mode***

=== v2.2 === 24 Sep 2013 ===

Keeping pace with Google's revisions.  Make sure to put your Calendar settings to "Comfortable" mode.

=== version 2.1 === 08 Aug 2011 ==========

This version contains some more slimming, specifically to the buttons up top.  Also, Google made a couple changes to the CSS id's, which resulted in the Google-branded search header re-appearing for many users.  This version corrects that and covers these changes:

1. #vr-proto-nav --has-become--> #vr-nav
2. #vr-proto-header --has-become--> #vr-header
